alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 10 at 2:56AM MST until November 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains, and Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...From 5 AM Saturday to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow is expected to reduce visibility along the immediate eastern slopes of the Northern Rocky Mountain Front Saturday afternoon and evening. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches is expected at Marias Pass, with higher totals over the higher mountain peaks.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
